name: Arizona Rose and the Pharaohs' Riddles
description: Arizona Rose is the world's foremost treasure-hunter, and her latest adventure takes her to Egypt, where an ancient temple has been unearthed. Inscribed on its walls are mysterious glyphs - a code, of the sort only Arizona can solve!
minimum_requirements: Processor: 1.5 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: any
